entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
